description: A bunch of small changes I threw together into a mod.
name: Quark

cleanup-menu.name: Cleanup Menu
cleanup-menu.description: Makes the main menu makes it more visually appealing.

glow-colored-trails.name: Glow Colored Trails
glow-colored-trails.description: Allows users to utilize their glow color for their wave and player trail instead of the secondary color.

hide-ship-trail.name: Hide Ship Trail
hide-ship-trail.description: Hides player trail in ship so you can see your ship fire better.

im-nosy.name: I'm Nosy
im-nosy.description: Allows you to view a user's comment history regardless of whether they have it disabled or not.

same-dual-color.name: Same Dual Color
same-dual-color.description: Colors both dual icons with the player one colors.
